title: Did my account get hacked?!?!?
body: I'll make this quick, basically I've had an account for a long time now and I've been in and out of the game but yesterday after I typed in my password I received a message that says my "combination is incorrect". I retried my password and username too many times, I have also requested an email to retrieve my pass and user and I have not received an e-mail yet. Any admin that reads this and can retrieve my account please contact me ASAP, thx.

replies.body: I am having the same problem. I just changed my password and stuff

It definitely sounds like your account may have been compromised. I'd first recommend changing the password to the email that was associated with your account before moving forward. After you've ensured your email is secured, I'd reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Fill out as much information as you can, as more information helps recover an account faster.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Sorry to tell ya but i'm having the same problem as well. I submitted a request to recover my account but it shows that I haven't provided enough proof to prove I'm the original owner. I been playing this game for 5 years from 2009/2010 until 2014.
